TopicTitle: International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit.

Articles.Content:
ATV + Ariane 5 released! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12106-0-20-Lionhead-Aerospace-Inc-ATV-Ariane-5-released-now-%21%21

Awesome!

Also on an unrelated note, next time I post it will be from right outside of NASA JSC in Houston.
Was there tuesday. Ah so close man. What y'all don't know is my dad is working on the actual Orion Craft, not supposed to say what part, he invited me to come to his meeting.

Well I was gonna make something like a gold foiled box for a satellite, google GPS SAT and the first image is what im looking for, im just gonna try look around and if there's non ill attempt to make my own.
OP's link is busted.
This one works. http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-19-x-iss-space-station-pack-ver-0-03/ Or it just did for me.
I am unable to dock at the port at the end of the Mir core module using Soyuz,what am I doing wrong?
I am unable to dock at the port at the end of the Mir core module using Soyuz,what am I doing wrong?

I am unable to dock at the port at the end of the Mir core module using Soyuz,what am I doing wrong?

Did you jettison the Mir launch probe ? Did you already have a PMA on your station ?
None of the docking ports on the ISS work with the stock, buran, soyuz or orion space craft. Help.

Was there tuesday. Ah so close man. What y'all don't know is my dad is working on the actual Orion Craft, not supposed to say what part, he invited me to come to his meeting.

That's so freaking awesome! Also, my apartment is right across the street from Lockheed Martin (developer of Orion, for those who don't know)! I'm going to be spending the summer at JSC looking at the effects of space weathering on the Lunar rocks brought back by the Apollo missions. I'm hoping to work on the Mars Science Lab (MSL Curiosity) in grad school; I've made some MSL connections and next year will be my last of undergrad. On an ISS note, some pics from the Hobby Airport to post, but those will come in the morning as I am tired from packing, traveling, and unpacking.

Edited June 2, 2013 by Anthony Frushour

There needs to be a disclaimer in the OP, so many posts about docking issues. PMA is broken peeps, it ruins docking. Also the docking ports need to be the same size so if you're editing cfgs they wont work!
OK, everyone, docking ports are broken on it, there working as well as they can to fix it, but there still tiring to find to issue!

It's unfortunate that there's some issues with the parts.

Hopefully, everything will get sorted out soon, eagerly waiting until then!

OK, everyone, docking ports are broken on it, there working as well as they can to fix it, but there still tiring to find to issue!

ok,so this answers my question on why the soviet docking ports on the .Crafts dont work(yes,all soviet docking ports dont work for me on the iss,the american one does work :S)

but all docking ports seem fine when placing them on parts in sph and docking them with rovers on the runway.(excluding PA)

so strange

well its supposedly the PMA causing these issues.

CBM works for me but not MIR.
